trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is created.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised when an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is data bound to a source.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataListItemEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs> class.
When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following property is initialized to the specified value.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object that represents an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
Gets the referenced item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control when the event is raised.
The items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are referenced as each item is created or bound to the control.

Use this property to programmatically access the referenced item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised.
The referenced item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control when the event is raised.
